FuncDef: The radius-server nas-port-id-format command sets the format of the NAS port ID attribute. The undo radius-server nas-port-id-format command restores the default format of the NAS port ID attribute. By default, the new format of the NAS port ID attribute is used.

ParaDef.Info:
Uses the new format of the NAS port ID.
-

Uses the old format of the NAS port ID.
-

Uses the NAS port ID format that is customized by the vendor.
The value is 9.

ExtraInfo: The NAS port format and the NAS port ID format are developed by Huawei, which are used to ensure connectivity and service cooperation among Huawei devices.
